text: I kinda wanna send a company email to all of our clients that simply says “GDPRmaggeddon” ```You've already got a thousand emails about it that you're not going to read. Here's a link to our Privacy Policy, you're also not going to read. Pro-tip: if you search in your email 'Privacy Policy' or 'gdpr' you can bulk mark those as read/archive/delete. Good luck out there InboxZero people!```
Does anyone know how to access your previous badges in HubSpot for training?
For example, im inbound certified but I wanted to access the badge for it
it used to appear on the certification course listing area
It doesnt look like it does anymore

Anywho, one thing we noticed is if you are showing these on a site and then the cert expires, it simply shows a broken image link. Is there a way HS could instead just load a blank 1x1 px image instead of just breaking the image?
that’s a good point. Or even if it slapped a big “expired” message on it that’d be okay
its suppose to just say expired according to the docs on it
i'd love to see two versions of it, one like the current badge and another like you see on the "my team" listing with a hover over that just shows the expire date lke
maybe have it say "Inbound Certified till 5/2019
Yea I agree there, that’s more useful

thought this was worth sharing - ShareThis announced a GDPR compliance tool to help with explaining to site visitors what their data is used for as well as providing opt in type stuff. <https://www.sharethis.com/gdpr-compliance-tool/>

Obviously none of these kinds of tools are a silver bullet, just interesting.
